product_name: Big Agnes Air Core Insulated Mummy Sleeping Pad
long_description: The Big Agnes Air Core Insulated Mummy Sleeping Pad is so lightweight you'll never tire of carrying it. With 3.25 in. of thickness, you'll be so comfortable you may want to bring along an alarm clock. PrimaLoft(TM) Synergy synthetic insulation makes this 3-season pad a smart choice for added comfort and warmth on backpacking trips to high elevations. R-value equals 4.1; most sleeping pads we sell range in R-value from 1.0 (minimally insulated) to 9.5 (well insulated). I-beam construction eliminates welded seams to reduce cold spots and ensures quick inflation/deflation, consistent airflow and stability. Durable, lightweight diamond ripstop nylon fabric on the top and bottom withstands regular use in the outdoors. 3.25 in. thick pad is waterproof and lightweight; pad packs down to be just a bit larger than a standard Nalgene bottle. The Big Agnes Air Core insulated sleeping pad includes a stuff sack and repair kit; repair kit is in a small pocket on the inside of the stuff sack.
